meanings.definition: Hexokinases: enzymes that catalyze the phosphorylation of hexoses.
meanings.sent1: The hexokinases in our body help convert sugars into energy.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study hexokinases to understand how cells process sugars.
meanings.sent3: The hexokinases at the sugar factory were working overtime, turning hexoses into fuel.
meanings.sent4: Like busy bees in a hive, hexokinases buzz around, transforming hexoses into usable energy.
meanings.sent5: The hexokinases acted like tiny chefs, cooking up hexoses into a delicious energy dish.
